title: Tea Caddy, "House Model", ca. 1870
provenance: 2012, from Eugene V. and Clare Thaw, Purchased from Asprey's, Bond Street, London in the late 1970s.
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: in the form of a nineteenth century Gothic-Tudor style half-timbered house with numerous chimneys, the roof lifting to reveal 2 tea caddies and one glass mixing bowl

tombstone.epitaph:
Tea Caddy, "House Model", ca. 1870.
ca. 1870. various woods. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2013-3-6-a/f.
